```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

#bind_rows
```{r}
a <- data.frame(a = 1:2, b = 3:4, c = 5:6)
b <- data.frame(a = 7:8, b = 2:3, c = 3:4, d = 8:9)
bind_rows(a, b)
```
# if_else

if_else(condition, true, false, missing=NULL)

```{r}
library(dplyr)
x <- c(-2:3, NA)
if_else(x < 0, NA_integer_, x)
if_else(x < 0, "negative", "positive")
```

#case_when

```{r}
x <- 1:50
case_when(
  x %% 35 == 0 ~ "fizz buzz",
  x %% 5 == 0 ~ "fizz",
  x %% 7 == 0 ~ "buzz",
  TRUE ~ as.character(x)
)
```
